summary: Iteration 88: Complete testing of Monday.com Config tab in Payment Alerts module. All backend APIs (5 endpoints) tested and working: test connection, get/save config, list boards, get board columns/groups. Frontend UI fully verified: Monday.com Config tab renders correctly, Test button shows connected status with toast notification, Board dropdown loads 51 boards, Column mapping dropdowns display correctly, Group selection works, Save Configuration persists settings. All other tabs (Pending Queue, Email Rules, Settings, Processing Log) still function correctly.
passed_tests: Backend: POST /api/wallet-topups/monday/test returns connected=true, user=Kevin, account=Chili Center
Backend: GET /api/wallet-topups/monday/config returns default config with all expected fields
Backend: GET /api/wallet-topups/monday/boards returns 50 boards including 'Recharge Approval'
Backend: GET /api/wallet-topups/monday/boards/18399959471/columns returns 8 columns and 2 groups
Backend: PUT /api/wallet-topups/monday/config saves board_id, board_name, enabled, post_email_as_update
Backend: PUT /api/wallet-topups/monday/config saves column_mapping correctly
Backend: Enable/disable sync toggle persists correctly
Backend: Post email as update toggle persists correctly
Backend: All Monday endpoints require authentication (401 without token)
Frontend: Monday.com Config tab is visible in tabs list (Config Monday.com)
Frontend: Monday.com Connection card shows 'Click Test to verify connection'
Frontend: Test button triggers connection test, shows toast 'Connected: Kevin (Chili Center)'
Frontend: Connection status displays 'Connected: Kevin (Chili Center)' with green checkmark
Frontend: Sync to Monday.com Board toggle checkbox works (shows 'Enabled')
Frontend: Board dropdown loads 51 options from Monday.com API
Frontend: 'Recharge Approval (ID: 18399959471)' board is selectable and shown as selected
Frontend: Group selection dropdown appears with 'Group Title' option
Frontend: Column Mapping section displays all 5 visible mapping fields
Frontend: Amount mapped to 'Monto (numbers)'
Frontend: Sender Name mapped to 'Cliente (text)'
Frontend: Status mapped to 'Status (status)'
Frontend: Warning/Risk mapped to 'Warning (text)'
Frontend: Bank Reference mapped to 'Referencia (text)'
Frontend: Save Configuration button is present
Frontend: Other tabs (Cola Pendientes, Reglas de Email, Configuraci√≥n, Registro de Procesamiento) all accessible
seed_data_creation: Backend test saved Monday.com config with board_id=18399959471 (Recharge Approval), column mappings for amount, sender_name, status, warning, bank_reference, email_date, enabled=true.
context_for_next_testing_agent: Iteration 88 fully tested Monday.com Config tab. The Monday.com API is connected to 'Chili Center' account as user 'Kevin' (teck@koh.one). Target board is 'Recharge Approval' (ID: 18399959471) with columns: Name, Cliente (text), Monto (numbers), Warning (text), Status (status), Referencia (text), Date (date), Person (people). Groups: 'topics' and 'group_title'. Config is saved in MongoDB collection 'wallet_topup_monday_config'. When pending topups are created, they sync to Monday.com using the column mapping. All 5 Payment Alerts tabs verified working.

monday_config_tab.test_connection: Shows connected status with toast notification
monday_config_tab.board_selection: 51 boards load from API, Recharge Approval selectable

monday_api_endpoints.GET /monday/config: Returns config object with board_id, column_mapping, enabled, post_email_as_update
monday_api_endpoints.GET /monday/boards/{id}/columns: Returns 8 columns and 2 groups for Recharge Approval board
